channel.title: Help needed, just questions
channel.description:
[center]Well I've recently been curious about Python scripting and it seems alot easyer to implement Python and base skills, minigames, eating etc off that. What do you guys think.
Question: How do I get Python?
Where could I learn Python?
Is it better to do main server features in Python?
If I was to get Python, how would I add it into my source?
Thanks. Please reply guys. :o[/center]
